basics.name: Rade Bajic
basics.current: Team Lead / Senior Expert @ Strabag SE
basics.summary: Experienced civil engineer specializing in delay analysis, scheduling, and risk management. Currently pursuing my third master’s degree in Data Analytics at Georgia Tech, with a focus on integrating data-driven insights into construction.

work.name: Strabag SE
work.summary: Leading a team focused on delay analysis, claim management, risk management, and dispute resolution in large-scale construction projects. Providing expertise on FIDIC contracts and managing project risks across international projects. Overseeing multiple dispute resolution processes, including dispute service quality assurance, cost-effective case management, and coordination of interdisciplinary teams. Advising project teams in contract negotiations and risk management. Training junior staff on delay analysis and contract management. Conducting training on FIDIC contracts, delay analysis, claim management, and dispute avoidance.

work.name: CML Construction Services GmbH
work.position: Testifying Expert Witness on Delay & Quantum
work.summary: Serving as an expert witness in delay and quantum matters, with a strong focus on ICC arbitrations and DABs. Extensive experience in acting as an expert before Dispute Adjudication Boards and International Arbitration Tribunals. Cross-examined in ICC arbitration hearings, participated in hot-tubbing, and drafted joint expert reports.

work.name: AzWirt
work.summary: As the main contractor, managed a €400 million highway project, including 6 NATM tunnels, 60+ structures, and a bridge over 1 km long in a challenging geotechnical environment involving multiple subcontractors. Focused on contract management, budgeting, and cost control. Oversaw the project schedule, prepared EOT claims, contributed to budgeting, and actively monitored project performance to ensure alignment with targets.

work.name: RZD
work.summary: Led technical office activities for a +1B $ high-speed railway construction project. Responsibilities included managing work preparation, program management, quantity surveying, and ensuring compliance with quality assurance protocols.

work.name: Integral Engineering
work.summary: Handled project engineering tasks, including site management, work preparation, and cost estimation for tendering processes in various construction projects.

references.name: Melis Mani, Dr. Jur.
references.reference: Melis Mani is a legal expert and colleague at Strabag SE, specializing in dispute resolution and FIDIC contracts: Rade is a dedicated and detail-oriented expert with a wealth of experience in delay analysis and project management.

references.reference: Nabeel Kokhar is a construction expert and colleague at CML Construction Services GmbH, specializing in delay and quantum analysis: Rade is a highly skilled expert witness with a deep understanding of delay and quantum matters.
